Title: Redemption

Actors: Sendi Bar, Shahar Even-Tzur, Moshe Folkenflick, Yonatan Galila
Plot: Menachem, a former frontman for a rock band, is now religious, and a father to a six-year-old. When his daughter is diagnosed with cancer, he must find a creative solution to fund the ...
